item.title: C++ and CMake
item.description: CMake in VSCode VSCode is a free open source IDE with a lot of nice features. In addition one can chose from a variety of extensions. Looks like Cmake-tools kind of works, but the hotkeys and some settings are far from intuitive. In my previous attempt I ended up removing cmake tools plugin and moving forward with custom task.json and launch.json scripts. Here is a template I made back then. https://github.
